snippet.title: Echo Combat | Launch Trailer | Oculus Rift
snippet.description:
Visit https://ocul.us/echo-combat to learn more about Echo Combat, Ready At Dawn’s zero-g, co-op PVP shooter—demoed by Ninja in the 2018 Gamers’ Choice Awards!

Battle in zero-g like never before, with lasers, shields, detonators, and more. Team up with friends and soar into multiplayer mayhem with two explosive modes: Payload or Capture Point.
 
Lock down your team. Load up your weapons. And blast off for zero-g PVP—Echo Combat is available now.

Learn more about Ready at Dawn: 
Website: http://www.readyatdawn.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ReadyAtDawnStudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RAD_Studios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ReadyAtDawnStudios/
 
Official Oculus Channels:
Oculus: http://ocul.us/Oculus 
Facebook: http://ocul.us/Facebook 
Twitter: http://ocul.us/Twitter 
Instagram: http://ocul.us/Instagram
 
Buy Rift: www.oculus.com/rift
Follow Oculus Rift on Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OculusRift
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OculusRift
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oculusrift
